description: The web browser conditions, web standards and specifications.
The development methods and work processes, and above all agile system development methods.
The methods of quality assurance.
The development process for a front end developer.
How the student can choose work and project methodology according to requirement specifications against set quality requirements in delivery.
How to create efficient front end code.
Responsive web design and adaptation of graphics to web pages.
The development environments, programming languages, guidelines and conditions of the web languages (HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript).
Overview of other commonly used applications, programming languages and digital tools within the front end industry.
Overview of trends in relation to their own professional role within the front end industry.
How to create front end solutions for different user needs and how to build accessible and inclusive applications.
Tools, methods and tips and tricks to make your website look good.
Identify and plan out tasks needed to deliver user-interface based websites, services and applications.

Create personal solutions for composite problems in digital communication, service and product development which requires an understanding and dimension of several different aspects such as a customer's business, user behavior, technical possibilities and limitations.
Identify a complex problem, break it down and apply skills in design and development to solve it.
Release and maintain a product. Have skills in programming, accessibility, publishing and debugging front end code.

Problem solve and communication skills when working in a project with different disciplines both internally and with consultants. This can be for example UX designers, backend developers, testers, designers and product owners.
Independently run and complete projects and communicate solutions effectively.
Methods of online-remote working, the skills to be able to work online with regards to teams, individual work and client relations.
Independently use adequate technologies required in the professional role of frontend developer to create frontend-solution.
Collaborating effectively as employees and leaders in the management and implementation of projects.
Independently be able to work methodically and flexibly in development projects and sub-processes.
Independently monitor work in teams and complete proposed projects.
Handle expectations of customers and stakeholders in such a way that it leads to further learning and completion of projects.
Applying core/fundamental/specialized knowledge within Frontend development for its own continuing learning and continuous professional development.
